item.title: Our Project.
item.description: Developer Survival ðŸ’»ðŸŽ® # Have you ever felt like the process of fixing a bug in a program was like a game? We started making this game out of this idea. It also means that we will become great programmers by improving our programming language proficiency. 1. How did you make this project? # The game was created using Python and Pygame. The website is based on Hugo. Also, it contains the efforts of jukanmi, highlees, khb7 and plmokn5w.

item.title: About Us.
item.description: Hello, World! # We are Team-CTRL. # jukanmi # (Week 12) - Create Git branch - Update README.md - Help team members set up Git remote storage (Week 13) - Implement basic capability values, movement, and damage functions of the monster class - Create graphics of game monsters - Resize character graphics for game application highlees # (Week 12) - Propose a project demonstration plan using Hugo - Update README.
